description._content: Description: On the B 1 at Maidan-i-Naftun. The base of the gach wall can be seen blackened by the crude oil brought down by the stream. Location: Maidan-i-Naftun, Persia Description: Another oil seepage at the Oil-Fields. On the Styx in the central part of the Maidan. Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/714 This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons Please use the comments section below the pictures to share any information you have about the people, places or events shown. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
